greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor(n*t^3) - A003146(n), where t = 1.8392867... is the tribonacci constant A058265.
comment: Always in the set {-1,0,1,2,3}, but first occurrence of -1 is at n = 2047. - _Jeffrey Shallit_, Nov 19 2016
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 28 2016
